Utility class for reading data bit by bit using java.io.InputStream as a basis.

Build a canonical Huffman tree from the lengths of initial codewords.

Populate code table with codes from Huffman tree.
buildFreqTable(File) - Method in class compresch.huff.HuffmanFrequencyTable
Build frequency table from input file by traversing it once and counting occurrences of all bytes.
